Key Match Events: England win the T20 World Cup for the second time
Star all-rounder Ben Stokes once again proved himself the ultimate big-game player, steering England home with six balls to spare
Post-Match Reflections: England are setting the bar. It's time for others to step up and match them now
Congratulations to England, who aside from a 'blip' against Ireland, have been so superb in this form of the game over the last couple of years
Miscellaneous Highlights: Predicted rain failed to arrive and interrupt Sunday night's blockbuster decider as 80,462 fans turned out for a rematch of the 1992 ODI World Cup final at the same venue
Others: England and Pakistan both took unchanged teams into the decider after peaking at the right end of the tournament
Despite a forecast of heavy showers and possible storms, rain did not disrupt the match
